mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CYCLE C JOIN (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEDIUMCATE M ON P.MEDIUMCATE=M.MEDIUMCATE) PM ON C.PRODUCTNO=PM.PRODUCTNO WHERE MEMBERID=#{id} AND C.PRODUCTNO=#{no}
SELECT LARGECATE, COUNT(*) count FROM CYCLE C JOIN (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P JOIN MEDIUMCATE M ON P.MEDIUMCATE=M.MEDIUMCATE) PM ON C.PRODUCTNO=PM.PRODUCTNO WHERE MEMBERID=#{id} GROUP BY LARGECATE
